Issue.description: vinyl-fs > glob-watcher > gaze > globule > lodash │ ├───────────────┼──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤ │ More info │ https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/782 https://nodesecurity.io/advisories/577 The fix is Run npm install --save-dev gulp@4.0.2 to resolve 6 vulnerabilities *SEMVER WARNING: Recommended action is a potentially breaking change* >
